home.title: wtrfll keeps controller and display views in sync
home.description: Create a session, share the generated links, and let the operator publish references while the display mirrors them live.
steps: Create a session and share the Control and Display links.
From Control, type a reference (John 3:16-18, Psalm 23, etc.) and publish it.
Display receives that state via SignalR so every screen stays in sync.
